name: Public Square
description: An establishment offering food, drink, or lodging; adventurers can rest, meet informants, or overhear tavern talk.
atmosphere: The square has a vibrant, communal atmosphere with the sound of public gatherings and the scent of street food and celebration. The air carries the promise of community events and the essential nature of public space, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of social connection and the excitement of shared experiences.
